title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a built-in model library and simple REST/CLI APIs.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter giving Ollama models Chat, Embeddings, and Tool-calling support.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (chat, model manager, RAG) that proxies to any Ollama instance.

title: ollama-cli
summary: TUI chat client in Rust with history, markdown, and model switching.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp for retrieval.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive wrappers.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama; supports chat, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All desktop UI with an Ollama backend option for cross-platform model management.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cody
summary: Sourcegraph Cody extension that can point to any Ollama instance for private-code chat.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a “Chat with notes” pane powered by any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client for Ollama with async HTTP, SSE streaming, and nimble package.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-dbee
summary: DBeaver extension that adds SQL-aware AI assistance via an Ollama model.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI micro-template that exposes OpenAI-style endpoints backed by Ollama for easy drop-in replacement.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets a server chat with any Ollama model through slash commands.
